about_the_game:
Freshen up your trucks with an original and modern livery. Introducing the Street Art Paint Jobs Pack, now available for all current truck models (except 8x4 chassis configurations) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and to some of the ownable trailers as well!

These new unique and colorful designs have been hand-crafted by our talented artists and are, of course, coming with predefined color presets alongside a fully customizable color palette, giving you a wider array of options when customizing your truck and trailer in the upgrade shop.

This pack includes six marvelous paint schemes:

  • Truck Yeah!
  • Colour Leap
  • Lost for Words
  • Red Dragon
  • Wild
  • Play Worlds

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.
detailed_description:
Freshen up your trucks with an original and modern livery. Introducing the Street Art Paint Jobs Pack, now available for all current truck models (except 8x4 chassis configurations) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and to some of the ownable trailers as well!

These new unique and colorful designs have been hand-crafted by our talented artists and are, of course, coming with predefined color presets alongside a fully customizable color palette, giving you a wider array of options when customizing your truck and trailer in the upgrade shop.

This pack includes six marvelous paint schemes:

  • Truck Yeah!
  • Colour Leap
  • Lost for Words
  • Red Dragon
  • Wild
  • Play Worlds

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 100 MB available space
